dict.acceptation: 社交聚会；党，党派；当事人；同类，伙伴；
为…举行社交聚会；为…请客；参加社交聚会；
政党的，党派的；社交的，聚会的；共有的，共同的；

sent.orig: Third-party software developers also provide repositories for their Fedora compatible packages.
sent.trans: 第三方(Third-party)软件开发者为他们的Fedora兼容包提供了仓库。

sent.orig: Pirate Festival: Improve pirate happiness with a big party.
sent.trans: 海盗们的假日：开个大Party能让海盗们心情愉快。

sent.orig: Do you want to throw him a surprise party?
sent.trans: 你想给他布置一个惊喜party吗？

sent.orig: Sebastian I think a nice swingers party would be great for me.
sent.trans: Sebastian:我想如果有个时尚party就好了。

sent.orig: Tired of taking pop bottles back to the party store.
sent.trans: 受够了带着饮料瓶回到party商店。
